text: The 1992 Pacific Curling Championships were held from November 1 to ??? in Karuizawa, Japan for men's teams only. Australia won the men's event over Japan (it was the second Pacific title for the Australian men). By virtue of winning, the Australian men's team qualified for the 1993 World Men's Curling Championship in Geneva, Switzerland. ==Men== ===Teams=== {| class="wikitable" ! Country !! Skip !! Third !!
